title: Session.0.94.0
description: This is the schema definition for the Session resource.  It represents the properties for the session with a Redfish Service.
specification: This resource shall be used to represent a session for a Redfish implementation.

UserName.description: The UserName for the account for this session.
UserName.specification: The value of this property shall be the UserName that matches a registered account identified by a ManagerAccount resource registered with the Account Service.

self.description: This is the URI of this resource.
self.specification: The value of this property shall reference the URI of this resource.

links.description: The object contains references to other resources.
